description: A protocol for contract-initiated offchain data retrieval

scripts.preinstall: run(){ for d in $npm_package_subpackages; do cd $d; echo $PWD; yarn install $* || exit; cd -; done; }; run
scripts.test: run(){ for d in $npm_package_subpackages; do cd $d; echo $PWD; yarn test $* || exit; cd -; done; }; run
scripts.lint: run(){ for d in $npm_package_subpackages; do cd $d; echo $PWD; yarn lint $* || exit; cd -; done; }; run
scripts.build: run(){ for d in $npm_package_subpackages; do cd $d; echo $PWD; yarn build $* || exit; cd -; done; }; run
scripts.clean: rm -fr node_modules; run(){ for d in $npm_package_subpackages; do cd $d; echo $PWD; yarn clean $* || exit; cd -; done; }; run
